short_summary: SQS Field Camp Catering – Sidney Island, BC
description: Parks Canada is seeking an experienced camp cook with an enclosed cook trailer with appropriate cooking equipment to provide food for a field camp on Sidney Island in Gulf Island National Park.
full_summary:
#SQS Field Camp Catering – Sidney Island, BC 
- **Solicitation Title EN/FR:** FM Catering Service for SQS Field Camp - Sidney Island, BC
- **Reference Number/Numéro de référence:** CB-8519-90563916
- **Date de publication/Publishing Date:** August 25th, 2023
- **Date limite de la soumission/Submission Deadline:** September 19th, 2023, 16:00:00
##Summary/Sommaire:
Parks Canada invites qualified bidders to submit their offers for FM Catering Services for SQS Field Camp in Sidney Island, BC. The duration of the Contract is 5 months, with an optional 1-year extension. Bidders must direct their submissions to the specified email address and fax number.

##Specific Contract Requirements:
- The Contract involves providing food services for a field camp operation at Sidney Island, BC.
- The successful bidder will be responsible for providing an experienced camp cook with an enclosed cook trailer, and appropriate cooking equipment.
- The prevailing period of the Contract is 5 months (November 15, 2023 to April 15, 2024), with an optional 1-year extension (April 16, 2024 to April 30, 2025).

## Bid Submission Procedure:
To ensure timely receipt of bids, bidders must direct their submissions to the following email address and fax number:

Email: soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca
Fax: 1-866-246-6893

## Important Bid Submission Requirements:
- Bidders must ensure that their electronic submissions do not exceed 15 megabytes in size.
- Bid documents must be sent as attachments, not via links.
- Bidders are responsible for ensuring the accuracy and completeness of their submissions.

##Land Claims Agreement:
The procurement is subject to the Tsawwassen First Nation Final Agreement.

##Contact Information:
For all technical and contractual inquiries, please contact:

Daniel Nguyen
Parks Canada
Email: daniel.nguyen@pc.gc.ca
Phone: (403) 836-2352
Fax: 1-866-246-6893

##Additional Resources:
The solicitation document and any future addenda are available at [Government Electronic Tendering Service](http://canadaunteer@gov-can.ca/). Please ensure that you obtain the most recent documentation. Late submissions will not be considered. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with
